descriptionHtml:
Description : 
============
Give a better look to the girl\'s !!

Version 0.1 Replace :(the mod use just 1 ESP file four all the girls)

*Fix the \"darker head skin than their body\" problem !* (100% working )
*Be sure the Cute Girl s Replacer Markarth v01 is activated in the plugins list !!!!!! 
*Push the plugin UP in the list between 20-30 INDEX !!!!!!
*Female  npc\'s :
===============
Understone KeepEdit :

   Faleen - Jarl\'s Housecarl.
   Voada - Servant in the Keep. 

OthersEdit :

   Anwen - a Priestess of Dibella.
   Betrid Silver-Blood - Thonar Silver-Blood\'s wife.
   Bothela - an elderly alchemist and owner of The Hag\'s Cure.
   Cairine - a Resident of The Warrens. 
   Frabbi - Wife of Kleppr.
   Ghorza gra-Bagol - an Orc Blacksmith.
   Hamal - the Mother, a Head priestess of Dibella.
   Hroki - Kleppr\'s daughter. 
   Kerah - Jewelry Merchant and wife of Endon.  
   Lisbet - Owner of Arleif And Sons Trading Company.
   Nana Ildene - an Old servant of The Treasury House.
   Margret - a traveler from the Imperial City.
   Muiri - Old alchemist Bothela\'s assistant at The Hag\'s Cure.   
   Orla - a Priestess of Dibella. 
   Rhiada - Owner of The Treasury House.
   Senna - a Priestess of Dibella.  
   Uaile - a Maid to Nepos the Nose.
    
More City\'s :
============

Cute Girl s Replacer Witherun v 3 by Laurkami ====http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12163

Cute Girl s Replacer Solitude v 1 by Laurkami ====http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12433
 
Cute Girl s Replacer Riften v 2 by Laurkami   ====http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12585
   

 Installation :
============

The Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) is recommended for properly installing the mod. If you use NMM, just download and install!

 Uninstalling :
=============

Delete all the files you installed/use NMM to uninstall them. Or manually delete Cute Girl s Replacer Markarth v01  from your Skyrim\\Data folder.

 Conflicts :
==========

May conflict with any other mods that change any of the above names !!!!

 Recommended / Requirements :
==============================


ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii -http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168 

Coverwomen by mrLenski-look 02 -http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563#content

CALIENTE FEMALE BODY MOD - BIG BOTTOM EDITION- CBBE, y NEVERNUDE Addon - <Website>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666</Website>

  Credits:
==========
Skyrim NPC Editor 0_67 by foretrenty
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
Coverwomen by mrLenski
CALIENTE FEMALE BODY MOD CBBE
Morwyn Kelm - for the suggested name and for a better sort of the ESP files
